TC.Description: Verify that the quote panel is displayed for the created or selected Policy
Verify that the quote panel is displaying the schemes of the created policy
Verify the column names in the Quote panel
Verify that the panel is sorted by Price with cheapest quote at the top
Verify that the event logs are created for quoted risks
Verify the column names for the declined quotes
Verify that the notes in total premium is disabled if declined quotes is selected
Verify the quoted schemes are displaying if Quoted radio button is selected
